Name: PolyRoyale
About the game: JUMP, LAND, FIGHT! - Play in Battle Royale or Endless Deathmatch mode and battle with up to 32 players. Play on small selectable PolyRoyale maps with a small number of players. You fight against bots and players as solo, duo or squad. Various weapons will help you survive. Choose a suitable look for your player character at the beginning. Be ready and jump out of a plane and fly through the air looking for a good place to land. And show that you can be a survivor. Only one can win! Get great achievements for your performance. Battle Royale Go into battle and grab the crown, you fight each other in solo, duo or squad mode. And be careful, you are trapped in a big cylinder that gets smaller and smaller and gradually changes its location! Endless Deathmatch In Endless Deathmatch, players compete against each other in an endless battle. Endless Deathmatch offers the possibility to go into battle alone, in a duo or in a squad. Info: - AI bots - Battle Royale Mode - Endless Deathmatch Mode - Mode: Solo, Duo, Squad - Different weapons - Different characters - Different maps - A small number of vehicles - Number of players self selectable (System-dependent)
